title: Trump’s crypto empire set to expand with new stablecoin and investment fund offerings
summary: World Liberty Financial, a cryptocurrency venture Trump co-found last year, announced Tuesday that it plans to launch USD1, a stablecoin pegged at a 1-to-1 ratio to the dollar
description: World Liberty Financial, a cryptocurrency venture Trump co-found last year, announced Tuesday that it plans to launch USD1, a stablecoin pegged at a 1-to-1 ratio to the dollar
